# v-responsive-embed



<!-- Auto Generated Below -->


## Properties

| Property      | Attribute      | Description                                                                                                                                      | Type     | Default  |
| ------------- | -------------- | ------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------ | -------- | -------- |
| `aspectRatio` | `aspect-ratio` | The aspect ratio of the embedded media in the format of `width:height`, e.g. `16:9`, `4:3`, or `1:1`. Ratios not in this format will be ignored. | `string` | `'16:9'` |


## Shadow Parts

| Part     | Description                   |
| -------- | ----------------------------- |
| `"base"` | The component's base wrapper. |
